http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT List YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-06T17:51:36Z Ian Brown 2015-03-06T17:51:26+00:00 2015-03-06T17:51:26+00:00 Reminder on nominations and updates from the National Network for the Education of Care Leavers (NNECL) National Strategic Group meeting. https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT;184bfaad.1503 Dear Colleagues<br><br>A reminder that I require any further interest in becoming a deputy regional representative (regional representative elect) by Wednesday next week (11 March). After this time, those names received will be put forward to the NorthCLASS meeting taking place on Monday 20 April.<br><br>I attended the NNECL NSG meeting yesterday at which further work on membership and governance were progressed. This should be concluded shortly and I will naturally provide full details as these emerge. One agreement made is that signing up for the newsletter will not constitute you being a member (if you have not registered to [...] Ian Brown 2015-02-25T10:31:48+00:00 2015-02-25T10:31:48+00:00 welcome, Introductions and Immediate Call for Action https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT;4642001d.1502 Dear Colleagues.<br><br>As per prior communications, I have now auto-enrolled those who did not advise otherwise to the YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT Jiscmail list. This is intended for use purely by those working within HE and FE institutions in Yorkshire & Humber region and to support our communications into and out of the National Network for the Education of Care Leavers (NNECL). For those unfamiliar with the NNECL, this is a voluntary group working to develop sharing of good practice in the support of looked after children and care leavers as they progress into and through FE and HE (more details can be [...] Ian Brown 2015-02-12T10:53:43+00:00 2015-02-12T10:53:43+00:00 Yorkshire & Humber Care Leavers Jiscmail List https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT;5e8e0a3b.1502 Dear colleagues<br><br>You are on the HEART database as members of staff in partner institutions or your names have either been provided by other Y&H partnership leads or have been pulled from the Who cares Trust HE Guide as being named staff for supporting care leavers into higher education. Naturally, if you know of colleagues in your own institution or other institutions in Y&H who are not included in this circulation do please forward the details to them on my behalf and cc me so that I am aware of their existence. [...] David Moore 2015-02-12T09:56:11+00:00 2015-02-12T09:56:11+00:00 Working https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT;22accbf5.1502 Think so Ian Brown 2015-02-12T09:38:11+00:00 2015-02-12T09:38:11+00:00 Test https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=YANDHCARELEAVERSSUPPORT;7ed8a5c.1502 Is this working?
